sources.title: These $140 earbuds translate 50+ languages while you listen
sources.snippet: The Mymanu Orb Open-Ear AI Translation Earbuds, showcased at CES 2026, offer users a unique blend of audio entertainment, real-world awareness, and advanced language translation technology. Priced at $139.99 (down from a $179.99 MSRP), these earbuds feature an open-ear design that allows users to hear their surroundings while simultaneously listening to music, taking calls, or translating real-time conversations. The standout feature is their built-in AI, which supports translation in over 50 languages across live conversations, phone calls, and spoken audio‚Äîideal for travel, work, or multilingual environments. Beyond translation, the earbuds function as typical audio accessories with a sleek, lightweight, and water-resistant design. With up to 35 hours of battery life using the charging case and hands-free controls, they offer a user-friendly and futuristic audio solution without added complexity.

citation_mappings.claim_text: üéß Dedicated Devices / Wearables Translation earbuds (e.g., live-translate models translating 50+ languages while you talk).SFGATE
Standalone handheld translators ‚Äì devices that translate voice in real time without a phone (varies by brand).iGeeksBlog

sources.title: Google Translate brings real-time speech translations to any headphones
sources.snippet:
Google Translate has introduced a major update allowing live speech translations on all headphones, not just Google's Pixel Buds. Available in beta starting today, the feature supports over 70 languages and requires only a compatible Android phone with the Translate app‚Äîunlike Apple‚Äôs version, which is limited to AirPods. This expansion marks a shift towards broader accessibility for real-time translation.

Additionally, Google Translate is improving text translations with the help of its Gemini AI, which enhances the accuracy of idioms and slang, offering more natural interpretations of phrases like ‚Äústealing my thunder.‚Äù The update also expands the Practice feature‚Äîsimilar to Duolingo‚Äîto 20 more countries and supports more languages. This interactive learning tool provides personalized sessions that adapt to users‚Äô language levels.

The live translation update is rolling out on Android in the US, Mexico, and India, with an iOS version expected next year. Enhanced text translations are also now available on both Android and iOS, as well as the web. The Practice feature remains in beta and may be limited to some users.

citation_mappings.claim_text: üß† Integrated Features Some platforms (e.g., social apps or headphones) are adding built-in voice translation features that work without separate apps.theverge.com
